definition: sewn together with overhand stitches (close vertical stitches that pass over and draw the two edges together)
details:
adjective
- sewn together with overhand stitches (close vertical stitches that pass over and draw the two edges together)
= synonyms: oversewn
- with hand brought forward and down from above shoulder level
= example: with hand brought forward and down from above shoulder level
= synonyms: overhanded, overarm
